title: General Knowledge
description: A mix of questions from various fields – the perfect challenge for those who love knowing a little bit about everything!

title: Geography
description: Can you identify countries by their shapes? Do you know where the world's largest mountains and rivers are located? Test your geography knowledge!

title: Science & Technology
description: From Newton’s laws to modern innovations – see how well you know scientific discoveries and technological advancements.

title: Art & Culture
description: Explore the world of painting, music, literature, and film through intriguing questions on art history and pop culture.

title: World History
description: Test your knowledge of key events, leaders, and civilizations that have shaped the world as we know it today.

title: Mythology & Legends
description: From Greek gods to Norse warriors, dive into fascinating stories and beliefs from different cultures around the world.

title: Sports & Recreation
description: From the Olympic Games to the FIFA World Cup – how familiar are you with the history and rules of the most popular sports?

title: Movies & TV
description: Think you're a cinephile? Put your movie and TV knowledge to the test with questions spanning decades of entertainment.

title: Literature & Books
description: From Shakespeare to Tolkien – how well do you know your classic and modern literature?
